feed.title: Google Cloud: Anthos Attached Clusters
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Anthos Attached Clusters

entry.content:
You can now launch clusters with the following Kubernetes versions. Click on the following links to see the release notes associated with these patches:

  • 1.32.0-gke.1
  • 1.31.0-gke.4
  • 1.30.0-gke.7
entry.summary: New Kubernetes versions are available for launch, including 1.32.0-gke.1, 1.31.0-gke.4, and 1.30.0-gke.7. Please refer to the provided links for detailed release notes on each version.
entry.title: Announcement: New Kubernetes versions available

entry.content:
You can now launch clusters with the following Kubernetes versions. Click on the following links to see the release notes associated with these patches:

  • 1.31.0-gke.3
  • 1.30.0-gke.6
  • 1.29.0-gke.9
entry.summary: New Kubernetes versions are available for cluster launches. For more details on release notes, please refer to the provided links.
entry.title: Announcement: New Kubernetes versions available
